name: Enemy
greetingText: or belz or iceburg or maybe Shirin
wishText: These name are memories with you in the last years, jury and I will always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! I hope we can make many more memories like that and you will continue to grow and Honestly watching you grow always motivates me to be better too, that's my we are enemies
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
